title: Bug 5818Debugger Source Lookup page claims project is closed
description: I have a Java project in my workspace, and it is not closed.Upon starting the workbench, ProjectPropertiesDebugger Source Lookup, thepage claims that debugger source lookup is not available for closed projects.If I force a build of the project, it works as expected.If I close the workbench and restart, I get the same problem.20011106
